name: Google Talk Avatar File
summary: Learn about .AVATAR files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: In Windows Vista and Windows 7, AVATAR files are stored in the [user]\​AppData\​Local\​Google\​Google Talk\​avatars\​ directory.
You can typically rename AVATAR files with the ".jpg" or ".png" extension and then view them with a standard image viewer.
NOTE: Google Talk was discontinued in 2015.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
